channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Biller Direct
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Biller Direct

item.title: CVE-2023-42479|2023-12-12T00:59:36.906Z -- sap_se -- sap%20biller%20direct
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can embed a hidden access to a Biller Direct URL in a frame which, when loaded by the user, will submit a cross-site scripting request to the Biller Direct system. This can result in the disclosure or modification of non-sensitive information.
